column4: this kinda doesn't belong here but im sur eyou guys will know... If i register for a domain on some site but my hosting provider is someone else how do i get email from my hosting provider.. I already change the dns name servers to point to my hosting provider do i have to change the mx too?
Your domain name only lists the DNS servers. If you already configured that to your hosting provider, that part of the question is irrelevant
I'm not sure what the question/problem is...
